seo: Yoast SEO,信息泄露,漏洞检测,WordPress插件
summary: 该插件用于检测WordPress中的Yoast SEO插件是否存在通过wp/v2/posts REST端点泄露特色图像完整内部路径的漏洞，这种信息泄露可能帮助攻击者识别或利用其他漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin detects whether the Yoast SEO plugin in WordPress exposes the full internal path of featured images via the wp/v2/posts REST endpoints, which may help attackers identify or exploit other vulnerabilities.
